targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.received') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.received') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.projected') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.projected') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.difference') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.difference') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.pct_of_projection') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.pct_of_projection') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, json_extract(j.value,'$.ex_date_est') AS ex_date_est, json_extract(j.value,'$.pay_date_est') AS pay_date_est, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.amount_est') AS REAL) AS amount_est FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.alt.expected_events') j ORDER BY pay_date_est;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, json_extract(j.value,'$.ex_date_est') AS ex_date_est, json_extract(j.value,'$.pay_date_est') AS pay_date_est, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.amount_est') AS REAL) AS amount_est FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.alt.expected_events') j ORDER BY pay_date_est;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT j.key AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.amount') AS REAL) AS amount_30d, json_extract(j.value,'$.status') AS status FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.dividends.windows.30d.by_symbol') j ORDER BY amount_30d DESC;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT j.key AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.amount') AS REAL) AS amount_30d, json_extract(j.value,'$.status') AS status FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.dividends.windows.30d.by_symbol') j ORDER BY amount_30d DESC;
